details.objectivesTitle: What will you learn with this course?

courses.freeBanner: All our courses are offered for free. the university is based upon membership through donation and sharing.

about.p1: The Sovereign University aims at providing a Bitcoin high-quality, extensive, free and accessible education for all. We believe that education and comprehension is the key to mass adoption.
about.p2: As Bitcoin grows stronger everyday, so does its community.
about.p3: Community is our biggest strength, as our educational content is based upon volunteering teachers, passionate about transmitting their knowledge.
about.p4: The Sovereign University is a project powered by DécouvreBitcoin.
about.title: A little bit about us

bitcoinOnly.text: We focus on the Bitcoin revolution as a whole without falling into trading or shitcoinery.
bitcoinOnly.title: Bitcoin only

communityDriven.text: We are first & foremost a community of enthusiastics helping each other in their Bitcoin journey.
communityDriven.title: Community Driven

openSource.text: We aim to promote the free flow of knowledge.
openSource.title: Open Source

privacyFocused.text: We consider privacy to be one of the most fundamental human rights and most necessary for progress.
privacyFocused.title: Privacy Focused

first.tagLine: To learn the basics as well as the advanced
first.title: E-learning platform about Bitcoin

fourth.tagLine: To connect learners with their dream Bitcoin job

fourth.title: A link to the builders of the industry

hero.tagLine: Let’s embark into your Bitcoin educational journey

second.tagLine: To navigate your way among Bitcoin technological solutions
second.title: All useful tutorials

third.tagLine: To access all published knowledge in one open-source platform
third.title: All kinds of resources about Bitcoin

resources.headerText: Welcome into the infinit rabbit hole of Bitcoin ! In this section we will offer you in depth tutoriel on most bitcoin project out there. This pages in maintain by benevolel and passionate bitcoin who support thie open source project. If you fee we made a mistake please reach out. To see our financial attachement ot the project mention refer to our transparancie repport. Thanks for your trust in this university and enjoy the ride.
